title: our-leadership
content:

Secure .gov websites use HTTPS A lock ( Lock A locked padlock ) or https:// means you’ve safely connected to the .gov website. Share sensitive
              information only on official, secure websites. News Newsroom menu block two Stories Events Newsroom menu block three Communication Resources Press Kit Contact Contact Join Donate search Breadcrumb About Our Team Our Leadership Our Team Board of Directors Our Leadership AmeriCorps fosters a strong, collaborative environment in which people committed to service enjoy rewarding careers as they work with communities across the country. A talented and committed leadership team and Board of Directors make service a cornerstone of our national culture. Chief Executive Officer Michael D. Smith Michael D. Smith is the Chief Executive Officer of AmeriCorps—the federal agency for service and volunteering. CEO Smith has dedicated his career to social justice by reducing barriers and expanding opportunity for children and families in underserved communities, like those where he grew up. Chief of Staff Jenny Mauk Acting General Counsel Andrea Grill Chief Information Officer Prabhjot Bajwa Chief Financial Officer Malena Brookshire Acting Chief Program Officer Carly Bruder Chief Operating Officer Gina Cross Chief Data Officer Andrea Gibbons Chief Diversity and Inclusion Officer Anthony Hynes Chief Human Capital Officer Maelat Mathias Deputy Chief Program Officer Melissa Allen Deputy Chief of Staff, Strategic Engagement Tess Mason-Elder Deputy Chief Operating Officer Jake Sgambati Director, Reporting Compliance and Audit Minh Dinh Director, Monitoring Caroline Fernandez Acting Director, AmeriCorps VISTA Margaret Garvey Director, AmeriCorps NCCC Ken Goodson Director, Grants Administration Jill Graham Director, Research and Evaluation Mary Hyde Director, Regional Operations Erin McGrath Director, AmeriCorps State and National Sonali Nijhawan Director, Public Health AmeriCorps AJ Pearlman Director, Public Engagement Tannikka Richardson Director, Communications and Marketing Tonya Williams Director, AmeriCorps Seniors Atalaya Sergi Acting Senior Advisor for Native American Affairs Brooke Crosby Senior Advisor on Financial Reform Irv Dennis Senior Advisor for Strategic Partnerships Anna Hartge Senior Advisor for Veteran and Military Families John Lira Senior Advisor for the American Climate Corps Yasmeen Shaheen-McConnell Back to main content Sign up to hear about our latest news, events, and opportunities.
